lg.head: Chanson Balisage
For B. Tommie Usdin, Deborah Aleyne Lapeyre and Lynne A. Price, ever so kind to invite me
lg.l: And cursed XForms, he smote his XML
Indeed, despite the DTD, once parsed
Some text would not behave. He felt it fold,
A dream-dot-com to sell old Syriac
Somehow he'd need GODDAGs for TEI
Or lose the entire plot; XSLT?
Notation's where DOM-ish trees come to die.
Eyeing his smashed screen, he in the craqueleure,
This but one mocking word made out: CONCUR.

note.bibl: Nathan P. Gibson, Winona Salesky & David A. Michelson, Encoding Western and Non-Western Names for Ancient Syriac Authors, Balisage, 2015
